disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.alert: Special Note: Accessing or using any tool on this site is deemed as your unconditional acceptance of all terms. If you do not agree, please stop using immediately.
disclaimer.p1: 1. Learning Only: Tools are for technical learning, security analysis, and code auditing only.
disclaimer.p2: 2. No Infringement: Strictly prohibited for malicious cracking, removing authorization, or infringing intellectual property.
disclaimer.p3: 3. Exemption: Users bear all legal consequences of using these tools; this site assumes no liability.
disclaimer.p4: 4. Copyright: Decompiled code belongs to original authors; this site stores no files.
disclaimer.p5: 5. Termination: We reserve the right to ban IPs without notice if abuse is detected.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.local: Local Processing: JS Deobfuscation and Wxapkg Unpacking are done locally in your browser. Data never leaves your device.
privacy.cloud: Cloud Processing: Python Decompilation requires forwarding to a third-party engine via server. Files are deleted immediately after processing.
privacy.warning: Warning: Do not upload files containing confidential information (passwords, keys).

about.title: About Tool
about.desc: DevReverse is an online code analysis toolbox for developers, dedicated to simplifying reverse engineering workflows and assisting in code auditing and security compliance checks.
